item.title: Memo RBA: we ought to live with inflation, more of it
item.description:
That‚Äôs the headline for my latest piece in The Conversation. The article initially ran under a different headline, chosen by the publishers with an eye to maximising the number of search terms, but this failed miserably, and my preferred headline was restored. The insistence of publishers on choosing headlines has been a c‚Ä¶

URL: https://johnquigginblog.substack.com/p/memo-rba-we-ought-to-live-with-inflation?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: In the Generations After 1870, All That Is Solid Does Melt into Air, &

item.title: The Jews and Italians Against Liberalism
item.description:
An ill wind blew through the land. Life, suddenly crackling, was not what it once was. The young, they said, did not respect the old, and the nation they knew now did not resemble the nation of their memories, when chaos did not seem to swallow up so much. Crime was up, gas prices were up, and the rage they felt was no longer confined‚Ä¶

URL: https://rossbarkan.substack.com/p/the-jews-and-italians-against-liberalism?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: In the Generations After 1870, All That Is Solid Does Melt into Air, &

item.title: Does not compute
item.description:
There are days when I think that the history of our era, whenever it is written, will say that we were a society with manageable problems until the internet came along and ruined everything. I‚Äôm not completely convinced of this; not yet. But there are days when I think it, and more of them all the time‚Ä¶

URL: https://ryanavent.substack.com/p/does-not-compute?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web
